About.heading: Helping you make South Africa feel like home
About.subheading: SA Immi Consult is an immigration and education agency that supports individuals, families and businesses who want to study, live, invest or retire in South Africa.

whoWeAre.title: Who we are
whoWeAre.body1: South African Immigration consultants help people from around the world explore life, study and business opportunities in South Africa. We combine on-the-ground experience in Johannesburg with a deep understanding of the local immigration landscape.
whoWeAre.body2: We know that moving to a new country can feel overwhelming â€“ from choosing the right visa route to understanding which skills and professions are in demand. Our mission is to simplify this journey through a clear three-step process and ongoing, human support.

whySouthAfrica.title: Why South Africa?
whySouthAfrica.intro: South Africa offers a powerful mix of education, lifestyle and business potential.
whySouthAfrica.education: Internationally recognised education at a more accessible cost than many destinations such as Europe, Canada, the USA, Australia or the UK.
whySouthAfrica.visaFree: For many nationalities, short-term visits are straightforward, with visa-free entries or flexible visitor options that make the first exploration trip easier.
whySouthAfrica.business: Investor-friendly policies and trade relationships with more than 200 countries create opportunities for entrepreneurs and business owners.
whySouthAfrica.bricks: South Africa is part of BRICS, and historic ties with countries like Russia mean Russian-speaking clients are often met with warmth and interest.
whySouthAfrica.lifestyle: Mild climate, diverse nature, vibrant cities like Cape Town and Johannesburg, and a high quality of life with space, greenery and friendly communities.

steps.title: A simple three-step process
steps.intro: We structure your case into three clear stages so you always know where you are in the journey.

eligibility.title: 1. Eligibility assessment
eligibility.body: You receive a personalised assessment from authorised immigration consultants, so you understand which programmes and visa routes may be open to you.

preparation.title: 2. Application preparation
preparation.body: We help you gather and prepare your supporting documentation properly, reducing delays and common mistakes that can lead to refusals.

submission.title: 3. Submission and follow-up
submission.body: Your application is submitted correctly to the South African authorities, with guidance on next steps and support while you wait for a decision.

advantages.title: Why clients choose us
advantages.localTeam: We are based in Johannesburg and have lived in South Africa for many years.
advantages.languages: We work fluently in both Russian and English.
advantages.experience: Our consultants have more than 15 years of experience in immigration and education support.
advantages.loyalty: We offer a loyalty programme for returning clients and referrals.
advantages.translation: We provide certified translation and notarisation of documents in South Africa.
advantages.tailoredPath: We work with you to find an immigration path that fits your goals, not a one-size-fits-all solution.

services.title: What we help with
services.intro: Our services cover the full journey: from first questions and study plans to permanent relocation and long-term life in South Africa.

immigration.title: Immigration to South Africa
immigration.body: For those planning to live, work, retire or join family in South Africa.

items.0: Consultations on visas, permits and residency options.
items.1: Preparation of document packages for temporary and permanent residence.
items.2: Support with complex or unusual cases.

education.title: Education in South Africa
education.body: For students and parents looking for study opportunities.

items.0: Consultations on schools, language courses and universities.
items.1: Selection of study programmes that fit your goals and budget.
items.2: Support with applications and student visa processes.

realEstate.title: Real estate support
realEstate.body: For clients exploring housing or investment property.

items.0: Selection of properties for rent or purchase.
items.1: Coordination with trusted partners on the ground.
items.2: Legal support on property transactions through partner firms.

internationalVisas.title: Other visas and opportunities
internationalVisas.body: For clients legally based in South Africa who want to explore additional directions.

items.0: Support with tourist and study visas to destinations such as the USA, Canada, Europe and the UK via partner agencies.
items.1: Guidance on gathering and preparing documentation for these applications.
items.2: Ongoing information support throughout the process.
